conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway transformation with clear interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and projection; wall thickness and corners are mathematically consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The room configuration and adjacency (stairs, pantry, kitchen island) align perfectly with the plan. Slight simplification of some window outlines.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture corresponds well to the room labels (kitchen sink/stove, bathroom fixtures). Blocks used effectively.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and lighting; minimal rendering artifacts. Background is clean.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of specific window bay geometry compared to detailed 2D annotations.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that faithfully maintains structural proportions and interior layout of the architectural plan.
